case.title: User can select more than one tag.
Create article whit more than 1 characters
Cant create article with characters less then 1
Can't create an article wihtout tag
Must not have username with symbol %$#@^&()

section.name: 1. User can go to the github.

case.title: Must redirect on the "Sign in" form
Must redirected on the "Sign up" form
Users can select more than one tag.
The Sign in page must have the link with ‘Need an account’ text
If either of the text fields is left blank, the error must be shown to the user by the error message under the sign-in form.
If both fields are filled in but there is no record in the DB of the user name or the password is incorrect that must also be shown to the user.
Users that have not registered yet cannot log in.
Users can open the “sign in” page after clicking on the “SIgn IN“ link in the Conduit navigation bar.
There should be two text fields - one for entering an email/username and one for entering a password and [Sign in] button.
Link with ‘Need an account’ text redirects to the Sign-up page.
Validation username value: entered username should be present in the server DB. Empty field. No case sensitive.
Input field for username: user can input/copy/paste text in field
Must be field, required to fill
Must be field, required to fill
Validation email value: Entered email should be present in the server DB. Empty field. No case sensitive
Username/Password pair should be the same as on the server;
Possibility to paste a password text in the “password“ field.
Must redirect on the "Sign up" form
Must register username which the only Latin characters without special symbols.
Must register username wich symbols length 36 or less
Must not register a username that consist of empty spaces
Must Register a new username with no case-sensitive letter.
Must register username wich symbols length more than 4
Must be field, required to fill
The format of the email must be is [name]@[domain].[top-domain];
Must be field, required to fill
Must be field, required to fill
Required password form: at least one symbol, one integer, capital letter.
Must be field, required to fill
Should be the same as the Password field.
